features: MATCHING KNIVES TO FOOD -The chef’s knife is ideal for cutting and chopping large food while the paring knife is a good size for smaller cutting tasks. And a sharp peeler helps little chefs peel multiple types of veg and fruits with ease.Recommended for children from 7 years old

KIDS FRIENDLY DESIGN - This kids kitchen knife set is designed to safely practice cutting food in the kitchen. Both kids’ chef knife and the paring knife have blunt tips for safe use. The wooden handles are designed with grooves to teach little chefs to grip them in the right places. And the finger guard protects kids’ fingers from dangers.

TAKE CULINARY SKILLS TO THE NEXT LEVEL-Cooking is fun for kids, especially when getting to use kids' knives to cut through food successfully. The sharp blades of knives allow precision cutting. Our little chefs will be excited to explore ingredients and delicious recipes. (for the young user, ADULT SUPERVISION REQUIRED)

MATERIAL SAFE FOR HEALTH-Our kids kitchen knife set is made with high-quality stainless steel blades, 100% safe for children’s health; The beech wood handles give kids a comfortable hold, allowing little chefs to gain confidence in their practical knife skills.

GREAT COOKING GIFT FOR KIDS -It is wonderful that kids participate in preparing the meal. This children´s knife set is a perfect kids´ utensil that makes food preparation safer and faster. Our kids will gain confidence in their practical life skills, and those skills equip kids to live a healthier lifestyle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kibbidea 4-Piece Kids Knives set helps kids take cooking to the next level! Cooking can be a pleasure for children of all ages. Learning to cook also is a great way to help them build healthy eating habits. Kibbidea kitchen knife set is designed especially for kids. It´s a perfect cooking gift that gives kids confidence in the kitchen and cultivates a love of cooking in them.

A Great Cooking Gift for Children! The Set Includes: 1 X Chef Knife: heavy-duty enough for chopping, cutting, and slicing food. 1 X Paring Knife: use for paring & cutting different types of vegetables and fruits 1 X Finger Guard: protecting fingers when kids cut food 1 X Peeler: a sharp, safe peeler perfect for any peeling task 1 X Cut Resistant Glove: work safer with glove Recommended for children from 7 yearsNote: from December 1, 2022, we have included gloves in kids knife set. If there are no gloves in the set ordered after December 1, 2022, please contact the seller in time
Peel, slice, dice kitchen ingredients so much easier and effectively

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to handle
reviews.reviewText: My daugther loves this. She is learning to cook and she is is 8yrs old. Easy grip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the junior chefs
reviews.reviewText: I love having my kids in the kitchen "helping" me cook. They are now at an age where they can actually participate with some of the prep work. Having the right tools makes everything safer and more fun.This set is well packaged and well designed for smaller hands. The blades have rounded tips to help prevent accidental pokes. The blades are also sharp enough out of the box to start working right away. They've held an edge through quite a bit of use and have only needed some minor touch ups. Not a huge fan of the holes in the blades as this is a great place for food to get stuck, but it's not bad. Also a through-tang blade would help with balance and help to create proper technique. Minor quibbles though for a nice beginner set.The other accessories in the kit, the peeler and finger guard, are also good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars safety knives for kids are easy to cut with
reviews.reviewText: My grandchildren and I love to spend time cooking together. They have been using child-safe plastic knives, which do work surprisingly well, but some of the kids are getting older and ready to graduate to a metal knife. This set of 2 knives and a scraper provide a perfect transition to the time that they’ll be ready to graduate to regular knives. The blades are sharp enough to easily slice up a bunch of carrots. The only issue I had was that the handle is small, so it was a little hard to use, but I persevered. Both the larger knife and the paring knife cut well. The safely feature is that the tip of the knife is rounded. I was able to peel the carrots with the scraper as easily as when I peel with my high-end scraper. In addition to the rounded blade tips, there are other safely features. One is a pair of gloves that will protect hands from getting cut, plus a metal finger guard.
